name: One Day Dazu Grottoes Tour
description:
One-day Tour of Dazu Grottoes is a selected route of Chongqing Tour. Group departs everyday.
Dazu Grottoes is one of the World Cultural Heritages. It represents the grotto art during late Tang Dynasty with its 76 cliff carvings, about 60,000 figure statues and 100,000 Chinese characters of inscriptions and epigraphs. The most famous ones are Baoding Mountain Rock Carving and Beishan Mountain Rock Carving.
